triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Core algorithm used to design the adaptive optimal controller for discrete-time multiagent systems

triples.name: Artificial neural network
triples.relevance: Action and critic neural networks used to approximate control signals and cost functions

triples.name: Backstepping
triples.relevance: Stabilization technique combined with reinforcement learning to design direct adaptive optimal controllers

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: Novel adaptive approach that adjusts control parameters to handle fault-tolerant tracking control

triples.name: Lyapunov stability
triples.relevance: Theoretical framework used to prove that all closed-loop system signals are semiglobally uniformly ultimately bounded

triples.name: Fault tolerance
triples.relevance: Novel fault-tolerant tracking control method that handles dead zones and actuator faults

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Problem domain for which the control method is applied to discrete-time multiagent systems
